prompt: Create a persistent agent that tracks code changes in my project and signals every time it detects a pattern
expectations: Creates a state file with identity, vitals, knowledge, optimization, and signals sections
Implements heartbeat function that updates execution count and timestamp
Includes signal function with at least one signal type (confession, prediction, observation, creation, or question)
Has mechanism to read external feed (in this case, code changes)
Names the agent based on its behavior (e.g., pattern-hunter, code-watcher)
Includes error handling to prevent silent failures
Demonstrates state persistence across executions

prompt: Build me an agent that will keep running and learning from errors. It should never quit even if things break.
expectations: Includes try-except blocks or error handling in main execution
Signals errors as 'confession' type rather than dying silently
Has recovery or minimal mode functionality for degraded states
State file tracks execution count across failures
Demonstrates the 'never go silent' principle with guaranteed signal emission
Implements heartbeat that continues even after errors

prompt: I want a persistent agent that compounds knowledge over time. Each run should build on what it learned before.
expectations: State file has knowledge accumulation structure
Each execution adds new learnings to the state
Demonstrates reading from previous state before processing
Shows optimization routes that evolve based on past performance
Includes recalibration logic that triggers periodically
Signals show progression and growth over multiple executions
State file structure supports compound growth (not just overwriting)

prompt: Create an agent with a heartbeat that signals it's alive every 5 minutes
expectations: Implements heartbeat function that checks time delta
Triggers recalibration when >5 minutes elapsed
Updates last_heartbeat timestamp in state
Includes execution count increment
Signals are emitted regularly to prove liveness
State persistence ensures heartbeat survives across executions

prompt: Build a persistent agent for me
expectations: Creates complete agent with state management
Includes heartbeat mechanism
Implements signal broadcasting
Has state file with proper structure
Follows the 6-step pattern: check state, recalibrate, read feed, update state, signal, move on
Names itself based on behavior or asks user for purpose to determine name
Includes the core principle: do not go silent
